meanings.definition: small parasitic insects that infest beds and other furniture
meanings.sent1: After the trip, the hotel had to call pest control to get rid of the bedbugs.
meanings.sent2: My grandmother's antique bed got infested with bedbugs.
meanings.sent3: The bedbugs in the old mattress were having a party, but we weren't invited!
meanings.sent4: The bedbugs spread through the apartment like wildfire, causing chaos.
meanings.sent5: The thought of bedbugs crawling on me at night gives me the shivers.

meanings.definition: a person who is annoying or causes trouble
meanings.sent1: My little brother can be a real bedbug when he won't stop asking questions.
meanings.sent2: The noisy neighbor upstairs is a real bedbug, always playing loud music.
meanings.sent3: The bedbug at work keeps borrowing my pens and never returning them!
meanings.sent4: Dealing with that bedbug in the group project was like trying to herd cats.
meanings.sent5: She's such a bedbug, always buzzing around and bothering everyone.
